name: DarkPoulpySouls
description:
You control a very angry squid who hate love !

Play with the arrow keys on your keyboard and your mouse ! (left clic to shoot and right clic to boost when bar is charged !)

It's not an easy game, and anger will be your friend till the end ! Good luck !

(A game created during a game jam with Arthur Pejoine (Artyu), Romain Malka, Corentin LG)
